name: pancong-kece-app
description: Pancong Kece Cafe Management System - Bundle Siap Deploy

scripts.setup: cd backend && npm install && node utils/dbSeed.js
scripts.build: echo 'Starting build...' && npm run build:backend && npm run build:functions && echo 'Build completed successfully'
scripts.deploy: npm run build && echo 'Ready for Netlify deployment'
